name: Prisca Hsu
title: Content Creator
bio: Hey listeners! My name is Prisca and I am a first-year MSc student studying motor disorders related to pediatric stroke at the Institute of Medical Sciences. I recently completed my BSc in Neurosciences at Western University and my honors thesis focused on music perception and production abilities in Parkinson's Disease patients. Outside of the lab, I am a classically-trained pianist, an avid tea-drinker and a skin care enthusiast!
